Sunday Afternoons at 3 o'clock
July 2 through September 24, 1950
in the Second Floor Lecture Hall
RADIO BROADCASTS
KFAC will broadcast the first hour of each concert beginning at 3 P.M. KUSC(FM) will broadcast the
complete concert each Sunday at 3 P.M., and repeat the program (transcribed) the following Tuesday
at 8:30 P.M.
Produced by the Division of Education through a grant from the Music Performance Trust Fund of
the American Federation of Musicians, in collaboration with the Musicians Mutual Protective AssociaÂ¬
tion of Los Angeles, the Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors and the Los Angeles County Music
Commission.
